name: Attaches Command Prompt as a Debugger to a List of Target Processes
description:
Attaches cmd.exe to a list of processes. Configure your own Input arguments to a different executable or list of executables.
Upon successful execution, powershell will modify the registry and swap osk.exe with cmd.exe.

input_arguments.name: parent_list
input_arguments.description: Comma separated list of system binaries to which you want to attach each #{attached_process}. Default: "osk.exe"
input_arguments.value: osk.exe, sethc.exe, utilman.exe, magnify.exe, narrator.exe, DisplaySwitch.exe, atbroker.exe

input_arguments.name: attached_process
input_arguments.description: Full path to process to attach to target in #{parent_list}. Default: cmd.exe
